DOC.brief_summary: Subjects acute coronary syndrome schedule cardiac catheterization enrol study . Subjects treat clinically coronary artery stenting randomize receive loading dose clopidogrel versus ticagrelor diagnostic angiography prior stenting . Optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) perform stenting presence blood clot inside new stent measure compare group .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Ticagrelor Versus Clopidogrel Residual Thrombus Burden During PCI : OCT Study
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects acute coronary syndrome schedule cardiac catheterization enrol study . Subjects treat clinically coronary artery stenting randomize receive loading dose clopidogrel versus ticagrelor diagnostic angiography prior stenting . Optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) perform stenting presence blood clot inside new stent measure compare group
DOC.criteria: Patient Characteristics : 1 . Males nonpregnant female > 18 < 79 year age present acute coronary syndrome define two follow criterion : 1 . Signs symptoms consistent accelerate angina prolong angina ( last great 20 minute ) either rest minimal exertion 2 . ECG change indicative new ischemia 3 . Levels cardiac biomarkers ( troponinT ) upper limit normal range . 2 . Patients schedule undergo coronary angiography possible percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) Lesion Characteristics Diagnostic Coronary Angiography 1 . De novo lesion native coronary artery find diagnostic coronary angiography 2 . Angiographic stenosis < 100 % 3 . Reference vessel diameter 2.5 mm 4.0 mm visual estimation General Exclusion Criteria 1 . Subjects unable unwilling sign inform consent form 2 . Subjects treat antiplatelet medication aspirin prior diagnostic catheterization include glycoprotein IIb/IIIa inhibitor . 3 . Subjects serious comorbid condition judgment investigator preclude inclusion study 4 . Subjects NYHA class III IV heart failure know leave ventricular ejection fraction < 30 % 5 . Subjects ST elevation myocardial infarction 6 . Subjects hemodynamic electrical instability ( include shock ) 7 . Subjects diagnose severe , noncatheterrelated coronary artery spasm 8 . Subjects may pregnant 9 . Subjects know allergy contrast medium 10 . Subjects renal failure define eGFR < 60 . 11 . History TIA stroke < 6 month 12 . History hemorrhagic stroke 13 . Hepatic insufficiency define liver cirrhosis , AST/ALT/Alkaline Phosphatase great 3 time upper limit normal hyperbilirubinemia . Lesion Specific Exclusion Criteria These exclusion criterion apply target lesion image OCT. 1 . Lesion locate leave main coronary artery 2 . Lesions heavily calcify 3 . Lesions OCT perform due technical difficulty 4 . Other lesion investigator deems inappropriate procedure sit excessive tortuosity low flow TIMI grade . 5 . Lesion saphenous vein arterial conduit
